room_title: Escape room "The Ruins" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: The Ruins room was super fun, and Aaron was an excellent guide who gave just the right hints! Great activity, great staff.

room_title: Escape room "The Ruins" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We got 75% done with Ruins! Travis was an awesome guide - and I believe Kelly? I believe that's her name! Defiantly coming again on do-over days!

room_title: Escape room "The Ruins" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: My wife and I went to the Charlotte North location today. With the help of our navigator Kelly, we were able to escape The Ruins! Exit Strategy delivers time and time again. Thanks for the awesome experience Kelly!

room_title: Escape room "The Ruins" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: My son and I are avid people that like to do escape rooms. We came to Charlotte for the night and did the Ruins room. Kelly our host was awesome and set the game scenario just right. We will definitely come back again to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Ruins" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Great room! We did the Ruins and Christy was awesome with her character. Had a great time!
